title: A few words for and about Mary Kochan
description:
Mary and I had 3!! Conversations. The Quote she reads is from Von Hildebrandt in this video:
https://youtu.be/dAu5zh_iRlo

Other 2 Convos:
On Organic farming: https://youtu.be/K7kEHkN6l9E
Pirsig's confusing use of Substance: https://youtu.be/2W1-JBfm8Cw
